title: rename_ambiguous_locals
before:
def count_items(d):
    x = d.get('items', [])
    n = len(x)
    return n
after:
def count_items(d):
    items = d.get('items', [])
    item_count = len(items)
    return item_count
notes: Rename ambiguous locals x/n to meaningful names.
